title: Tonari no Oniisan
sinopse:
Multiple short stories:

1. Tonari no Oniisan (The Older Brother Next Door)
2. Nimotsu Mochi (Holding Baggage)
3. Kaihi Koudou (Avoidance Behavior)
4. Kuchibiru wo Nazoru (Tracing Lips)
5. Ryouri no Ude wa Cho Ichi-ryuu (You're Cooking Ability is the Best)
6. Egao de Sayounara wo (To Say Goodbye with a Smile)
